sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ịga ụlọ mkpọrọ abụghị ekpere mmadụ na-ekpere onwe ya maọbụ onye nke ya.
William Kondowe nọchara afọ atọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, mgbe ọ pụtara, a na-eche na ọnọdụ a gbanwere ndụ ya ma na ndị uweojii mechara gbuo ya mgbe ọ gara ọzọ izu ụgbọala mmadụ.
Kirie akụkọ a n'uju ebe a:
Akụkọ ndị ga-amasị gị:
Rochas Okorocha: Mmadụ asụkapụla n'ụlọikpe ebe a na-ekpe ndi otu ya ikpe
Nigeria Air Force ewepụtela aha ndị nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu n'Abuja
Ikemba Iweala: Ihe ị maghị maka odogwu nwoke a bụ di Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala
th Headies: Ihe ị kwesiri ịma, oge, ebe na etu ị ga-esi kiri emume a
